Doc: Represents an evergreen option that is available within a letter of credit instrument.

Source.Contents:
/#
   Represents an evergreen option that is available within a letter of credit instrument.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.EvergreenOption {
  # The number of calendar days before the expiry of the letter of credit, that the borrower must declare an intention to extend the letter of credit.
  nonRenewalNoticePeriod : FpML5.confirmation.Period?

  # The number of calendar days defining the extension period.
  extensionPeriod : FpML5.confirmation.Period

}

nonRenewalNoticePeriod.Doc: The number of calendar days before the expiry of the letter of credit, that the borrower must declare an intention to extend the letter of credit.
nonRenewalNoticePeriod.Name: nonRenewalNoticePeriod

extensionPeriod.Doc: The number of calendar days defining the extension period.
extensionPeriod.Name: extensionPeriod
